entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
